plays.text: Penalty to Chris Phillips 2 minutes for Tripping Dan Hinote

Penalty to Milan Hejduk 2 minutes for Slashing Karel Rachunek
Penalty to Rob Blake 2 minutes for Roughing Karel Rachunek
Penalty to Andre Roy 2 minutes for Interference Pascal Trepanier
Goal scored by Martin Havlat assisted by Radek Bonk and Andre Roy
